thread.title: Egypt: Egyptian Community in Ny Celebrate in "Times Square" to Promote Tourism, Investment
thread.title_full: Egypt: Egyptian Community in Ny Celebrate in "Times Square" to Promote Tourism, Investment

title: Egypt: Egyptian Community in Ny Celebrate in "Times Square" to Promote Tourism, Investment
text:
Egyptian Community in Ny Celebrate in "Times Square" to Promote Tourism, Investment Tagged: 
The Egyptian community in New York organized a celebration in Times Square on Friday to promote the flow of tourism and investments to Egypt. 
Egypt's flags were raised and pro-Egypt slogans were chanted. 
Advertisements about Egypt's tourist cities were displayed on screens in the square. 
On Thursday, President Abdel Fattah El Sisi arrived in New York to take part in meetings of the 70th session of the UN General Assembly. 
MENA
